titleStmt.title: The Leveller: or, The principles & maxims concerning government and religion, vvhich are asserted by those that are commonly called Levellers.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, for Thomas Brewster, at the Three Bibles, at the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 16.th. Feb. 16 1658"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "9".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
